Ukraine carries out air assault on Crimea's port of FeodosiaUkraine carried out an air attack on Feodosia in Crimea, Ukraine's air force commander said on Tuesday, after the Russian-installed governor of the Crimea said that the assault sparked a fire in the town's port area. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:38:25 GMT JKEGUR5Z5ZJVHMA625IL7TX57M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-carries-out-air-assault-crimeas-port-feodosia-2023-12-26/Reuters世界欧洲
US retaliates in Iraq after three US troops wounded in attackThe U.S. military carried out retaliatory precision air strikes on Monday in Iraq after a one-way drone attack earlier in the day by Iran-aligned militants that left one U.S. service member in critical condition and wounded two other U.S. personnel, officials said. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:30:07 GMT S5MIHANTOZMOJAI4EEGILE62GA https://www.reuters.com/world/ Three-us-troops-wounded-attack-iraq-us-retaliates-2023-12-26/Phil Stewart世界
Japan to impose sanctions on three senior Hamas membersThe Japanese government will freeze assets and impose sanctions on payments and capital transactions on three senior Hamas members, Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi said on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:25:34 GMT G6MASCHXKNKR7DEQDWSEHFM7PU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-impose-sanctions- Three-senior-hamas-members-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China warns rocket remnants to hit South China SeaChina warned that remnants of a rocket would hit an area in the South China Sea on Tuesday, following the sixth deployment of its most powerful launch vehicle eleven days ago. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 01:39:57 GMT TBHRLQLGCJPELGK6EVQXXIFXVA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-rocket-remnants-hit-south-china-sea-maritime-safety-authority-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Mexican father spends Christmas hoping for family taken by Hurricane OtisCandido Trinidad de la Cruz had been planning a family Christmas celebration until Hurricane Otis hit two months ago and flooded the Mexican beach resort Acapulco, sweeping away his wife and two children, and all their belongings. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 01:18:05 GMT 3M32EEJME5L5LKSLGQZYR6ORQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-father-spends-christmas-hoping-family-taken-by-hurricane-otis-2023-12-26/Javier Verdin世界美洲
Blasts heard over Crimea's Feodosia - Russian news outletsLoud explosions were heard in early Tuesday hours over the Crimean town of Feodosia on the Black Sea coast, Russian news outlets on the Telegram messaging service reported. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 01:16:06 GMT HVSHBHXEYBKYXCXFLLTL54YKFU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/blasts-heard-over-crimeas-feodosia- Russian-news-outlets-2023-12-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Netanyahu vows no let-up in war but UN worker says Gazans have no place to goIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vowed to keep up the fight against Hamas militants, but a UN humanitarian team leader said Palestinian civilians who honor Israeli evacuation orders cannot be guaranteed safety. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 23:44:38 GMT FBDVB4IGS5NXHCKEEY7KUWDP7A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-vows-no-let-up-war-un-worker-says-gazans-have-no-place-go-2023-12-25/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Emily Rose世界中东
Ukraine draft law proposes lowering mobilisation age to 25 from 27Text of a draft law posted on the website of Ukraine's parliament late on Monday proposed lowering the age of those who can be mobilized for combat duty to 25 from 27. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 23:38:28 GMT ISFEF2LG65KFDJ6RZMPAMVI6JE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-draft-law-proposes-lowering-mobilization-age-25-27-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Displaced Gazans have little space left to go, UN aid worker saysMany Palestinians in the Gaza Strip have followed Israeli army evacuation orders and sought safety in designated areas only to find there is little space left in the densely populated enclave, a U.N. humanitarian team leader said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 22:40:12 GMT 6QQ6HRJN7RO6XDS2BGJWHGRV7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-aid-worker-says-little-space-left-displaced-gazans-go-2023-12-25/Humeyra Pamuk世界中东
Eight killed in Syria in Turkish airstrikes on SDF-controlled areas -statementThe Syrian Democratic Forces said late on Monday that eight people have been killed and 18 others wounded in Turkish airstrikes against SDF-controlled areas since Dec. 23. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 22:12:35 GMT SXHNCRN37FLYLARBJZKYZPOVNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eight-killed-syria-turkish-airstrikes-sdf-control-areas-statement-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东
At least 113 killed in attacks in central Nigeria, local official saysThe death toll in weekend attacks in the central Nigerian state of Plateau has risen to 113, a local official said on Monday, in a region where clashes between herders and farmers are common. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 18:35:38 GMT ZHXIXKDMSRNCDPXJ4W5YCD3KPM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-113-killed-attacks-central-nigeria-local-official-2023-12-25/Reuters世界非洲
